files.patch: @@ -4229,1 +4229,1 @@ - * single character UTF-16 equivalent + * single UTF-16 code unit equivalent @@ -4242,2 +4242,5 @@ - * content. - * + * content. The translation is done in a single pass and is non-recursive. That is, + * escape sequences and unicode escapes are translated as encountered in one pass and + * not done as an unicode escapes pass followed by an escape sequences + * pass. + *
